item.title: Vietnam January 2019 Dharma Activities (Part II)
item.description: 04 On January 3rd, the placement of His Holiness Dagchen Dorjechang Rinpoche’s holy relics into the newly constructed Parinirvana stupa and consecration of the stupa was carried out in a beautiful ceremony in front of the stupa.

item.title: Vietnam January 2019 Dharma Activities (Part I)
item.description: 01 His Eminence Khöndung Asanga Vajra Rinpoche and entourage touched down on Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam on December 31st, 2018 arriving to a warm reception led by his father H.

item.title: Invitation Letter from Sakya Vietnam Center
item.description: Invitation You are cordially invited to the Instatement Ceremony of H.
